name: Slot Video Games Style - cartoon effect embedding
description:
This is a style trained on backgrounds and characters from slot video games. You can use it on characters and scenes. Start (or end) your prompt with (slotgames:1.0) style or style by (slotgames:1.0)

Work with this style in the same way as described here.

I recreated some of the popular models' covers so you can see the difference.

If you copy prompts from the comparison images in the examples here, add the style tag manually. Single image examples have it, just copy-paste it all.

Enjoy!

modelVersions.description: Trained with 47 images of scenes, characters and objects in the same style. 40 000 steps with variable speed.
